title: Ticket #6438: Remove undocumented grid-only x509 proxy features
description:
The gridmanager two odd features involving X.509 proxies:

  • Config params JOB_PROXY_OVERRIDE_FILE and JOB_PROXY_OVERRIDE_FILE_<owner> force all jobs to use the given proxy file instead of whatever's named in the job ad.
  • If a job ad includes a proxy subject attribute but not a proxy filename attribute, the gridmanager attempts to find a proxy from another job with the same subject for use by the first job.

These features are undocumented and of dubious value. The functionality of JOB_PROXY_OVERRIDE_FILE can be better provided by submit transforms. I believe these features have not been used by anyone for a long time. We should remove them, which will simplify parts of the gridmanager code.
remarks:

These are undocumented features, so no version history is required.
